short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to assist with drug interaction entry

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to assist with drug interaction entry.  Facilitates user entry and helps identify medication names from a block of user-inputted text which can then be run through a drug interaction database.  Helps clinicians by saving time with going through text or lists to identify individual drug names.
